Mailing jail with Mailtrap.io: The mailtrap server name (may differ according to your plan).
Gaiola de E-mails com o Mailtrap.io: Nome do host SMTP do Mailtrap (pode variar dependendo do seu plano)

Mailing jail with Mailtrap.io: Find your SMTP Credentials on the Integration tab of your mailbox.
Gaiola de E-mails com o Mailtrap.io: Encontre suas credenciais de SMTP na aba Integration da sua conta Mailtrap.

Mailing jail with Mailtrap.io: "Disable Email Communications" is set is "Yes", please set to "NO" in "Mail Sending Setting"
Gaiola de E-mails com o Mailtrap.io: "Disable Email Communications" is set is "Yes", please set to "NO" in "Mail Sending Setting"

Mailing jail with Mailtrap.io: Stores > Configuration > Advanced > System > SMTP Configuration and Settings
Gaiola de E-mails com o Mailtrap.io: Stores > Configuration > Advanced > System > SMTP Configuration and Settings
